net.beaconcontroller.core

Interface IOFSwitchFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OFMessageFuture, OFStatisticsFuture

    public interface IOFSwitchFilter
    Used in conjunction with IOFMessageListener to allow a listener to filter an incoming message based on the IOFSwitch it originated from. Implementations wanting to use this interface should implement both IOFMessageListener and IOFSwitchFilter.
    Author:
    David Erickson (daviderickson@cs.stanford.edu)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isInterested(IOFSwitch sw)
      The result of this method call determines whether the IOFMessageListener's receive method is called or not.

    • Method Detail

      • isInterested

        boolean isInterested(IOFSwitch sw)
        The result of this method call determines whether the IOFMessageListener's receive method is called or not.
        Parameters:
        sw - switch to filter on
        Returns:
        true to receive the message, false to ignore
